title: Complete Goodyear Christmas Albums Vol 4
description:
From 1964, courtesy of the Christmas Shario blog, here is Volume 4 in the series of Christmas albums released each year by Goodyear as a promotional item.  For many of us boomers, these are the Christmas soundtracks of our memories.

01 Mary Martin - Silent Night
02 Leonard Bernstein, NY Philharmonic, Mormon Tabernacle Choir - O Little Town of Bethlehem
03 Robert Goulet - O Come All Ye Faithful
04 Eugene Ormandy - Joy to the World
05 Percy Faith - Good King Wenceslas
06 Brothers Four - What Child Is This? 
07 Mahalia Jackson - Holy, Holy, Holy
08 Mahalia Jackson - Abide With Me
09 Isaac Stern - Ave Maria (Bach-Gounod)
10 Doris Day - Toyland
11 New Christy Minstrels - The Shepherd Boy
12 Leonard Bernstein, NY Philmarmonic, Mormon Tabernacle Choir - Deck the Hall
13 Mitch Miller - The First Noel
14 Andre Previn - Hark, the Herald Angels Sing
15 Brothers Four - God Rest Ye Merry, Gentlemen
16 Mitch Miller - Coventry Carol
17 Eugene Ormandy & Philadelphia Orchestra - O Come, Little Children
18 Brothers Four - Go, Tell It on the Mountain
19 New Christy Minstrels - Sing Hosanna, Hallelujah
